scripts.bundle: microbundle -i resources/js/index.tsx -o resources/compiled/ignition.js --generateTypes false --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment -f cjs --no-sourcemap --external none --define process.env.NODE_ENV='production'
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development ROLLUP_WATCH=true concurrently -n "dev,typescript" -c ",green" "microbundle watch -i resources/js/index.tsx -o resources/compiled/ignition.js --generateTypes false --jsx React.createElement --jsxFragment React.Fragment -f cjs --no-sourcemap --external none --define process.env.NODE_ENV='development' --no-compress " "yarn typecheck"

hooks.pre-commit: lint-staged && yarn bundle && git add resources/compiled/ignition.js && git add resources/compiled/ignition.css
